title: How do I partially capture the screen?
answer:
On any screen, use the knuckle of any finger (such as the thumb or index finger) to touch the screen a little harder, and then draw a closed pattern without leaving the screen. After your phone successfully identifies the knuckle, it generates a blue track that moves along your knuckle's path.

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20151015180515322001.jpg) ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20151015180529699001.jpg) 

*For reference purposes only. Your phone's interface may differ from the interface shown in this image.
